sections.h1: When is the right time to seek support?

sideCard.title: Book support
sideCard.sub: If this feels relatable, support can help.

sections.html:
If you’ve been thinking about seeking support, you don’t need to “wait for things to get worse”. Often, the best time is when you notice a pattern: repeated overwhelm, sleeplessness, overthinking, or difficulty functioning in everyday life. Start small—share what you’re going through, what you want to feel instead, and what has been hardest lately. Support works best when it is gentle, consistent, and practical.

Note: This content is educational and not a diagnosis.
